deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

deposit(address,uint256,bytes).details: Deposit stablecoin into the system from the caller to be used for debt repayment or liquidation

params.usr: The source address which is holding the stablecoin
params.wad: The amount of stablecoin to be deposited [wad]

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

withdraw(address,uint256,bytes).details: Withdraw stablecoin from the system to the caller

params.usr: The destination address to receive stablecoin
params.wad: The amount of stablecoin to be withdrawn [wad]
